[id="ListProfileSummaries_{context}"]
= ListProfileSummaries

:toc: macro
:toc-title:

toc::[]


`GET /v2/compliance/profiles/summary`

ListProfileSummaries returns profiles matching each cluster and the given query

== Description







== Parameters
